Pleasing PSA2 Addie Joss-pitching for sale on my updated website. [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/[/url] $100.00. Offering 10% off on all cards until the end of October. Free shipping (not including insurance) on orders over $200.00. Lots of T206s and other new cards and many lowered prices.

Please email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] to confirm. NO PM's. Check or money order only; NO PAYPAL. New York residents must add sales tax. Mail payments to: Ed Hans; PO Box 307; Buffalo, NY 14207. First come, first served. Thank you.
